mission: ONIGEGE ARA- An academic institution making qualitative education, affordable ,providing and maintaining sound academics training, encouraging moral excellence among youths, providing sustainable human resources development ,providing ambassadors that will uphold and strengthen the effort of our past heroes
what: ONIGEGE ARA -An academic institution, approved by the government and appraised by the people to prepare learners to,acquire basic training leading to the award of public certificate-FIS, BECE, WASSCE, NECO, JAMB, GCE etc
who: Admission of eligible Students?Assisting in the Development of Sound Education?Ensure that educational Standard are maintained?Giving Children the vision of the great potentials which lie beyond examination
vision: ONIGEGE ARA- A first class academic body/education provider, adding value to educational goals of its numerous stakeholders and producing individual that will be useful to themselves, the nation and the world at large
